content: As with all other Curios' in Black Myth: Wukong, the Frosprout Twig can't be upgraded, so you can't increase its power or potency. Therefore, you will want to switch to other Curios items to better fit your build as you  via the Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Frostsprout_Twig.md', within the main section titled 'Frostsprout Twig'.
The content is as follows:
As with all other Curios' in Black Myth: Wukong, the Frosprout Twig can't be upgraded, so you can't increase its power or potency. Therefore, you will want to switch to other Curios items to better fit your build as you  via the Equipment menu.
